Affix.Name: Glacier and Snowfield
Affix.Desc: Increases Superconduct DMG by 100%. Increases Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Burst increases Cryo DMG Bonus by 30% for 10s.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Goblet of Aquilo
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A goblet of eonothem left behind by the knight who walked with the North Wind. The chill of the bitter winter frost still lingers within.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Plume of Snow
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A bird feather that was picked up by the knight who walked with the North Wind in the snow. It still awaits the day when it will thaw.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Crown of Glacier
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: The crown worn by the knight who walked with the North Wind. It was forged using winter ice and silver.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Heart of Frost
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A flower that has been frozen in time from the moment it was picked. The knight kept it as a memento forever after.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Glacial Sand
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A timepiece once used by the knight who walked with the North Wind. A never-ending snowstorm rages within.
